items.summary: In `backend/main.mo`, remove all principal-based access control from `getPendingVerifications()` and `approveUTR()`. Both methods must be callable by any authenticated user without any admin principal check. Remove or disable the `initAdmin()` method's principal-storage logic so it no longer gates access. Remove any stored admin principal state and all access-denied guard clauses from these two methods.

In `frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx`, remove the `initAdmin()` call on mount and remove the 'Access denied. Admin only.' error display logic. The component should proceed directly to calling `getPendingVerifications()` on mount and display the results. Any conditional rendering tied to an access-denied state must be removed.
